tool_description: Splits audio into manageable chunks based on silence detection and speaker changes for optimized transcription processing.

audio_file_path.description: Path to the audio file to segment

speech_segments.description: Array of speech segment timestamps from silence detection

max_segment_duration_seconds.description: Maximum duration for each segment in seconds

preserve_word_boundaries.description: Attempt to preserve word boundaries when segmenting

error_messages: Invalid speech segments: Speech segments array is empty or contains invalid timestamp formats.
Segment duration invalid: Maximum segment duration must be between 5 and 300 seconds.
Overlap too large: Segment overlap cannot exceed half of maximum segment duration.
Segmentation failed: Unable to create segments from provided speech data.
usage: Provide audio file path and speech segments from silence detection to create optimized audio chunks for transcription.

segment_paths.description: Array of paths to generated audio segment files

segment_timestamps.description: Array of segment timestamps in format 'start_ms-end_ms'
